name: Defa-protector-allow-mobile-plugin
tagline: A Simple Plugin Hack to Allow Mobile Browser to play Defa Protector 5.5+ Video
body:
### Welcome to Defa Protector Allow Mobile Plugins.
Defa Protector Allow Mobile Plugins is a extend of Defa Protector Platinum 5.5 or upper version to allow website owner to let user play Defa Protector Video on Mobile

But Be Caution : It can cause Security Copy Leaks there.

### Download
You can download Wordpress Plugin  on Wordpress Repository website. [Wordpress Repository Site](https://wordpress.org/plugins/allow-mobile-for-defa-protector/)


You can download All CMS Version on Sourceforge or on this Github page.

[Sourceforge](http://sourceforge.net/p/defa-protector-allow-mobile/)

[Github](https://github.com/juthawong/Defa-Protector-Allow-Mobile-Plugin)

### Installation 

For Wordpress Version , By just installing and activating plugin. it works automatically.

For ALL CMS Ready Script : 

`include('includetopperthandefaprotector.php');`

on top of the files or anywhere it should but should be topper than defa protector inlude('includetop.php');

### Authors and Contributors

Created By Juthawong Naisanguansee 2015 Age : 18 . Managing Director , Ampare Engine
